data.name: The Expendables 2 Videogame - Barney Ross Upgrade DLC
data.detailed_description: Maxes out all stats for Barney Ross!
data.about_the_game: Maxes out all stats for Barney Ross!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows® XP SP3 / Windows Vista® SP2
  • Processor:Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia Geforce 8xxx series or ATI Radeon HD 4xxx series
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS:Windows® 7 SP1
  • Processor:Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia Geforce 2xx series or Radeon HD 5xxx series
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound card
